dcterms:creator: S. Patiyal
A. Dhall
G. P. Raghava
dcterms:description: Dataset1 was introduced by the study of the DBPred model, a sequence-based deep learning method for predicting DNA-binding residues. The dataset was collected from hybridNAP and ProNA2020 and was composed of 646 proteins as the training set (TR646) with 15636 DNA-binding sites and 298503 non-binding sites, and 46 proteins as the testing set (TE46) with 956 DNA-binding sites and 9911 non-binding sites.
dcterms:title: Dataset1

dcterms:creator: Y. Xia
C.-Q. Xia
X. Pan
H.-B. Shen
dcterms:description: Dataset2 was originally proposed by the study of GraphBind, a structure-based graph neural network (GNN) model for identifying nucleic-acid-binding residues. This dataset consisted of protein-DNA complex structural data extracted from the BioLiP database, with 573 proteins as a training set (TR573) with 14479 DNA-binding residues and 145404 non-binding residues, and 129 proteins as a testing set (TE129) with 2240 DNA-binding residues and 35275 non-binding residues.
dcterms:title: Dataset2

dcterms:creator: Q. Yuan
dcterms:description: TE181 is a dataset created for evaluating protein-DNA binding site prediction models. It contains 3208 DNA-binding residues and 72050 non-binding residues.
dcterms:title: TE181

dcterms:creator: S. Patiyal
A. Dhall
K. Bajaj
H. Sahu
G. P. Raghava
dcterms:description: TE161 is a protein-RNA dataset used for predicting RNA-interacting residues in a protein using CNN and evolutionary profile.
dcterms:title: TE161

dcterms:creator: J. Dunbar
dcterms:description: TE259 is an antibody-antigen dataset collected from the SAbDab database, which contains structural antibody data.
dcterms:title: TE259

dcterms:creator: S. Patiyal

G. P. Raghava
dcterms:description: TR495 is a protein-RNA dataset used for predicting RNA-interacting residues in a protein using CNN and evolutionary profile.
dcterms:title: TR495
